shareMetaData.title: Okkar Kópavogur 2022
shareMetaData.description: Frá 26. janúar til 9. febrúar 2022 verður opið fyrir kosningar þar sem íbúar, fæddir árið 2004 eða fyrr, með lögheimili í Kópavogi geta kosið áfram hugmyndir í einum af fimm bæjarhlutum Kópavogs.

en.favorite_info: Use ❤️ for your favorite idea = two votes
en.choose_a_neighbourhood_2: Choose a neighbourhood to cast your vote. 200 million have been allocated proportionately.
en.general_error: An error has occurred, we have been notified
en.error_cant_connect: Can't connect to server, please try again later
en.error_could_not_post_vote: Could not post vote, please try again later
en.selected_items_info: You have selected {number_of_items} for a total of {selectedBudget} millions
en.selected_items_info_mobile: {number_of_items, plural, one {1 idea} other {{number_of_items} ideas} } - total {selectedBudget} millions
en.selected_items_info_one_million: You have selected {number_of_items} for a total of {selectedBudget} million
en.selected_items_info_mobile_one_million: {number_of_items, plural, one {1 idea} other {{number_of_items} ideas} } - total {selectedBudget} million
en.thank_you_2: Your vote has been received and you have been logged out.
en.thank_you_3: You can vote again until February 9th but only the last vote is valid. Thanks for participating. Results will be published on www.kopavogur.is
en.number_of_votes: Number of voters in this neighborhood
en.select_favorite: Select favorite for a double vote

is.favorite_info: Settu ❤️ við þína uppáhalds hugmynd = tvöfalt vægi
is.choose_a_neighbourhood_2: Veldu þér hverfi til að kjósa í. 200 milljónum hefur verið skipt á milli hverfa eftir íbúafjölda.
is.general_error: Villa hefur komið upp, við höfum verið látin vita
is.error_cant_connect: Get ekki tengst vefþjóni, vinsamlegast prófaðu síðar
is.error_no_items_selected: Það eru engar hugmyndir valdar í kosningu
is.error_does_not_fit_in_budget: þessi hugmynd er of dýr fyrir það sem er eftir af peningum
is.error_could_not_post_vote: Það hefur komið upp villa og þitt atkvæði er ekki móttekið, vinsamlegast reyndu aftur síðar
is.selected_items_info: Þú hefur valið {number_of_items, plural, one {1 hugmynd} other {{number_of_items} hugmyndir}} fyrir {selectedBudget} milljónir
is.selected_items_info_mobile: {number_of_items, plural, one {1 hugmynd} other {{number_of_items} hugmyndir} } fyrir {selectedBudget} milljónir
is.selected_items_info_one_million: Þú hefur valið {number_of_items, plural, one {1 hugmynd} other {{number_of_items} hugmyndir} } fyrir {selectedBudget} milljón
is.selected_items_info_mobile_one_million: {number_of_items, plural, one {1 hugmynd} other {{number_of_items} hugmyndir} } fyrir {selectedBudget} milljón
is.thank_you_2: Atkvæði þitt hefur verið móttekið og þú hefur verið skráð(ur) út.
is.thank_you_3: Þú getur kosið aftur en síðasta kosning gildir. Kosningu lýkur 9. febrúar. Niðurstöður kosninga verða birtar á heimasíðu Kópavogsbæjar.
is.select_favorite: Settu hjarta við uppáhalds hugmynd fyrir tvöfalt vægi

pl.favorite_info: Kliknij na ❤️ aby wybrać ulubiony pomysł = dwa głosy
pl.choose_a_neighbourhood_2: Wybierz dzielnicę, aby oddać głos. 200 milionów zostało rozdzielone na wszystkie dzielnice.
pl.general_error: Wystąpił błąd, zostaliśmy o nim poinformowani
pl.error_cant_connect: Brak łączności z serwerem, spróbuj ponownie
pl.error_could_not_post_vote: Nie można wysłać głosu, spróbuj ponownie
pl.selected_items_info_mobile: {number_of_items, plural, one {1 idea} other {{number_of_items} ideas} } - razem {selectedBudget} milionów
pl.selected_items_info_mobile_one_million: {number_of_items, plural, one {1 idea} other {{number_of_items} ideas} } - razem {selectedBudget} milionów
pl.thank_you_2: Twój głos został oddany i zostałeś wylogowany.
pl.thank_you_3: Możesz głosować ponownie do 9. lutego. Liczy się twój ostatni głos. Dziękujemy za udział w głosowaniu. Wyniki będą ogłoszona na www.kopavogur.is
pl.select_favorite: Dodaj do ulubionych, aby uzyskać dodatkowy głos
